note.p: Naval rating, zoologist, and taxidermist. Domestic third class RN and assistant to the naturalists on HMS Challenger, 1872–6; assisted with the reports of the expedition.
Census returns of England and Wales 1891 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG12/3201/18/29)
Glenn M. Stein, 2007, ‘The Challenger medal roll (1895)’, www.19thcenturyscience.org/HMSC/Chall-Medal/ChallengerMedal.html (accessed 20 October 2015)
